events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and classified under Auto Accident based on the description of damage to the vehicle.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to coordinate the investigation and communication.
Customer received official acknowledgment of claim filing along with next steps and contact information.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driver's insurance information to proceed.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos of the accident scene and official police report.
Investigation team began reviewing evidence and assessing fault related to the vehicle collision incident.
Investigation concluded confirming the cause of accident as driver negligence by the other party involved.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover repairs and medical bills related to the auto accident claim.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely response from support.
Claim approval was finalized and confirmed based on full compliance with policy terms and investigation results.
Insurance payment was issued to cover all costs associated with vehicle repairs and related expenses.
The claim case was officially closed after successful resolution and processing of payment for damages.
All documentation and records for the auto accident claim were securely archived for future reference.
